where.if: and ( LOWER(login_name) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) or LOWER(password) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) or LOWER(email) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) or LOWER(phone) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) or LOWER(site_name) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) or LOWER(site_url) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) or LOWER(remarks) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) )

update password_manager
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_name = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site_url = #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

createtime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update password_manager set login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_name = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_url = #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createtime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
